name: Charged Bandit GORE-TEX Trail Running Shoes - Men's

features: Gore-Tex® construction is 100% waterproof but remains incredibly breathable
TPU film for added support & durability where you need it
Molded Comfort Collar locks in the heel with a soft, plush feel for zero distractions
High rebound EVA sockliner for a comfortable & responsive ride
Charged Cushioning® midsole is firmer in the heel & softer in the forefoot for support & comfort
High-abrasion rubber traction outsole pattern for extended durability & grip out on the trail
Anatomically placed flex grooves offer proper flexibility in key areas
